title: Call for Articles - Rock Creek Free Press
cleaned_text:
Call for Articles — for the February 2008 Issue of the Rock Creek Free Press

Issue 6 of the Creek is on the newsstand now. (View it here)

We are now publishing monthly so that means we need your help even more. Please

 consider us for publication of your original article.

Since the very first issue, the Creek has covered the stories the main-stream

 press won’t touch: Torture, 9/11 Cover-up, Election Fraud, Vaccine Scams, The

 erosion of our Constitutional rights, and many more. With your help we will

 continue to provide the historical context and political analysis of the news

 that can’t be found in any other publication. And we put it in print on the

 streets in the Capitol City, where it counts. We continue to expanded our distribution

 in the Washington area with over 40 vending machines at major Metro stations

 and other high traffic locations.

I invite you to submit an article… it doesn’t have to be long (1000-2000

 words is ideal).

The deadline for article submission is 1/16/2007, but the earlier you can get

 your article to us the better.

Thank you in advance for you contribution to “the Creek”.
